supporting the beliefs of the political right, especially the extreme right, or relating to such beliefs: a prominent rightist Senator Rightist opportunism, he fears, can dilute the entire process.
More examplesFewer examplesIt has also benefited from controversial alliances with other rightist parties.Drug money fuelled the three-way war among leftist guerrillas, rightist paramilitaries, and the army.The common sentiment - "The bad people ruin it for all the rest of us" - captures much of the rightist worldview.
